page.title: 12Public Transport in the Area
page.content: Public transport is carried out by two local bus companies, the train service having been closed down in the 1950's. In the villages of Norbury and Roston and Snelston the bus company is Glovers of Ashbourne. They operate a daily school service taking secondary school children into Ashbourne. Also market day visits weekly to Uttoxeter and Derby with a twice weekly service to Ashbourne. On some routes the bus company operates a mini bus. The other bus company which has just taken over the route is Stevensons of Uttoxeter. They now operate between Uttoxeter and Ashbourne on a regular hourly service connecting in Ashbourne with the Trent Bus Company to Derby. In Uttoxeter Stevenson's have a regular service to Burton. A small railway station also operates in Uttoxeter connecting to mainline stations.
